 Atomic type for long int.

Detailed Description

Integral types for atomic operations.

Typedef Documentation

typedef atomic_long_selector<sizeof(long)>::atomic_long cds::atomic_integrals::atomic_long

Atomic type for long int.

The typedef selects appropriate atomic type depends on sizeof(long):

  • sizeof(long) == 4 for 32bit platforms and maps to atomic32_t
  • sizeof(long) == 8 for 32bit platforms and maps to atomic64_t
typedef atomic64u_unaligned cds::atomic_integrals::CDS_TYPE_ALIGNMENT(8) atomic64u_aligned

64bit aligned int

64bit aligned unsigned int
